text: She went back to Philip. But all she could hear were Nicholas's words: 'I love you oh, you know that well enough.' Love. She revolted against the word. Nicholas, Philip... where was happiness, or peace of mind? Philip put out a hand and grasped hers. He needed her. She would find solace in that fact at least. And she hadn't to doubt his sincerity any more.
